issue.title: [JS] add Vector.map
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2765](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2765). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add `Vector.map(f)` that returns a new vector transformed with `f`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2765?focusedCommentId=16528181) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
To be consistent with JS typed arrays, I think `Vector.map` should return the same type as the source vector, and we can add `Vector.from(source, f)` to change types. What do you think of that [~paul.e.taylor]?
